content.question: What sequence of activities does Xiaoming propose to Jiawei for next Saturday?

choices.label: They go to the school together, go back to Xiaoming’s house, eat lunch, and then play some games together.
Jiawei goes to Xiaoming’s house, they play some games together, they eat lunch, and then they go to the school together.
They go to Xiaoming’s house, eat lunch, go to the school, and then play some games together after they come back from the school.
Jiawei goes to the school to meet Xiaoming, they attend the competition together, they eat dinner at Xiaoming’s house, and then they play some games together.

content.answer: Jiawei goes to Xiaoming’s house, they play some games together, they eat lunch, and then they go to the school together.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
